GE07bhg4c11u:3: yat tvayoktaṃ vacas tena moho 'yaṃ vigato mama ||1||
GE07bhg4c11u:7: pūrvādhyāyānte viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti viśvātmakaṃ pārameśvaraṃ rūpam utkṣiptam |
GE07bhg4c11u:8: tad-didṛkṣuḥ pūrvoktam abhinandann arjuna uvāca mad-anugrahāyeti caturbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:10: paramaṃ paramātma-niṣṭhaṃ guhyaṃ gopyam api adhyātma-saṃjñitam ātmānātma-viveka-viṣayam |
GE07bhg4c11u:11: yat tvayoktaṃ vacaḥ aśocyān anvaśocas tvam ity ādi ṣaṣṭhādhyāya-paryantaṃ yad vākyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:12: tena mamāyaṃ mohaḥ - ahaṃ hantā ete hanyante ity ādi lakṣaṇo bhramaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:16_0: pūrvādhyāye nānā-vibhūtīr uktvā viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti
GE07bhg4c11u:16_1: viśvātmakaṃ pārameśvaraṃ rūpaṃ bhagavatābhihitaṃ śrutvā paramotkaṇṭhitas tat-sākṣātkartum
GE07bhg4c11u:17: mad-anugrahāya śoka-nivṛtty-upakārāya paramaṃ niratiśaya-puruṣārtha-paryavasāyi guhyaṃ gopyaṃ yasmai kasmaicid vaktum anarham api |
GE07bhg4c11u:18_0: adhyātma-saṃjñitam adhyātmam iti śabditam ātmānātma-viveka-viṣayam aśocyān anvaśocas
GE07bhg4c11u:18_1: tvam ity ādi-ṣaṣṭhādhyāya-paryantaṃ tv apadārtha-pradhānaṃ yat tvayā parama-kāruṇikena
GE07bhg4c11u:18_2: sarvajñenoktaṃ vaco vākyaṃ tena vākyenāham eṣāṃ hantā mayaite hanyanta ity ādivividha-viparyāsa-lakṣaṇo
GE07bhg4c11u:22: pārtha ānandito darśayitvā svaṃ hariṇā punaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c11u:23_0: pūrvādhyāyānte viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti sarva-vibhūty-āśrayam
GE07bhg4c11u:23_1: ādi-puruṣaṃ sva-priya-sakhasyāṃśaṃ śrutvā paramānanda-nimagnas tad-rūpaṃ didṛkṣamāṇo
GE07bhg4c11u:24: adhyātmaṃ iti saptamy-arthe avyayībhāvād ātmanīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:25: ātmani yā yā saṃjñā vibhūti-lakṣaṇā sā saṃjātā yasya tad-vacaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:30_0: pūrvatra aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarva-bhūtāśaya-sthitaḥ iti vibhūti-kathanopakrame viṣṭabhyāham
GE07bhg4c11u:30_1: idaṃ kṛtsnam iti tad-upasaṃhāre ca nikhila-vibhūty-āśrayo mahat-sraṣṭā puruṣaḥ svasya kṛṣṇasyāvatāraḥ,
GE07bhg4c11u:31: sa tu mahat-sraṣṭādi-sarvāvatārīti tan-mukhāt pratītya sakhyānanda-sindhu-nimagno 'rjunas tat-puruṣa-rūpaṃ didṛkṣuḥ kṛṣṇoktam anuvadati mad iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:32: mad-anugrahāyādhyātma-saṃjñitam vibhūti-viṣayakaṃ yad vacas tvayoktaṃ tena mama mohaḥ kathaṃ vidyām ity-ādy-ukto vigato naṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:33: adhyātmam ātmani paramātmani tvayi yā vibhūti-lakṣaṇā saṃjñā sā jātā |
GE07bhg4c11u:35: paramaṃ guhyam atirahasyaṃ tvad-anyāgamyam ity arthaḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c11u:38: bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānāṃ śrutau vistaraśo mayā |
GE07bhg4c11u:41: bhūtānāṃ bhavāpyayau sṛṣṭi-pralayau tvattaḥ sakāśād eva bhavataḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:43: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā ity ādau |
GE07bhg4c11u:45: kamalasya patre iva suprasanne viśāle akṣiṇī yasya tava he kamala-patrākṣa ! māhātmyam api cāvyayam akṣayaṃ śrutam |
GE07bhg4c11u:46_2: aparimitaṃ mahattvaṃ ca śrutam - avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:48: na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:50: atas tvat-paratantratvād api jīvānām ahaṃ kartety ādir madīyo moho vigata
GE07bhg4c11u:53: tathā saptamād ārabhya daśama-paryantaṃ tat-padārtha-nirṇaya-pradhānam api bhagavato vacanaṃ mayā śrutam ity āha bhavāpyayāv iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:54: bhūtānāṃ bhavāpyayāv utpatti-pralayau tvatta eva bhavantau tvatta eva vistaraśo mayā śrutau na tu saṃkṣepeṇāsakṛd ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:55: kamalasya patre iva dīrghe raktānte parama-manorame akṣiṇī yasya tava sa tvaṃ he kamala-patrākṣa ! atisaundaryātiśayollekho 'yaṃ premātiśayāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:56_0: na kevalaṃ bhavāpyayau tvattaḥ śrutau mahātmanas tava bhāvo māhātmyam atiśayaiśvaryaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:56_3: sopādhikaṃ nirupādhikam api cāvyayam akṣayaṃ mayā śrutam iti pariṇatam anuvartate ca-kārāt ||2 ||
GE07bhg4c11u:58_0: asmin ṣaṭke tu bhavāpyayau sṛṣṭi-saṃhārau tvatta iti ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:58_1: pralayas tathā ity ādināvyayaṃ māhātmyaṃ sṛṣṭy-ādi-kartṛtve 'py adhikārāsaṅgādi-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:58_2: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvam iti na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti ity ādinā ||2 ||
GE07bhg4c11u:60: he kamala-patrākṣa ! kamala-patre ivātiramye dīrgha-raktānte cākṣiṇī yasyeti premātiśayāt saundaryātiśayollekhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:61_0: tvattas tvad-dhetukau bhūtānāṃ bhavāpyayau sarga-pralayau mayā tvattaḥ sakāśād vistaraśo
GE07bhg4c11u:61_1: 'sakṛt śrutau ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā ity ādināvyayaṃ nityaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:61_2: māhātmyam aiśvaryaṃ ca tava sarva-kartṛtve 'pi nirvikāratvaṃ sarva-niyantṛte 'py
GE07bhg4c11u:61_3: asaṅgatvam ity evam ādi tvatta eva mayā vistaraśaḥ śrutam mayā tatam idaṃ sarvam ity ādibhiḥ ||2 ||
GE07bhg4c11u:64: evam etad yathāttha tvam ātmānaṃ parameśvara |
GE07bhg4c11u:65: draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ puruṣottama ||3||
GE07bhg4c11u:66: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca evam etad iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:67: bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānām ity ādi mayā śrutam |
GE07bhg4c11u:68: yathā cedānīm ātmānaṃ tvam āttha viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat ity evaṃ kathayasi he parameśvara |
GE07bhg4c11u:71: tathāpi he puruṣottama tavaiśvarya-śakti-vīrya-tejobhiḥ sampannaṃ tad-rūpaṃ kautūhalād ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi ||3||
GE07bhg4c11u:73: he parameśvara yathā yena prakāreṇa sopādhikena nirupādhikena ca niratiśaiśvaryeṇātmānaṃ tvam āttha kathayasi tvam evam etan nānyathā |
GE07bhg4c11u:74: tvad-vacasi kutrāpi mamāviśvāsa-śaṅkā nāsty evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:75: yadyapy evaṃ tathāpi kṛtārthī-bubhūṣayā draṣṭum icchāmi te tava rūpam aiśvaraṃ jñānaiśvarya-śakti-bala-vīrya-tejobhiḥ sampannam adbhutaṃ he puruṣottama |
GE07bhg4c11u:76: sambodhanena tvad-vacasy aviśvāso mama nāsti didṛkṣā ca mahatī vartata iti sarvajñatvāt tvaṃ jānāsi sarvāntaryāmitvāc ceti sūcayati ||3||
GE07bhg4c11u:77: viśvanāthaḥ : idānīm ātmānaṃ tvam yathāttha viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti,
GE07bhg4c11u:78: tac caivam eva mama nātra ko 'py aviśvāso 'stīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:79: kintu tad api saṃhṛtārtho bubhūṣayā tavaiśvaraṃ tad-rūpaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi yenaikāṃśeneśvara-rūpeṇa tvaṃ jagat viṣṭabhya vartase |
GE07bhg4c11u:80: tasyaiva te rūpam aham idānīṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ draṣṭum icchāmīty arthaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c11u:81: baladevaḥ : evam iti viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ ity ādinā yathā tam ātmānaṃ svam āttha bravīṣi,
GE07bhg4c11u:82: tad etad evam eva na tava me saṃśaya-leśo 'pi tathāpi tavaiśvaraṃ sarva-praśāstṛ tad-rūpam ahaṃ kautukād draṣṭum icchāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:83: he parameśvara he puruṣottameti sambodhayan mama tad-didṛkṣāṃ jānāsy eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:88: manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti prabho |
GE07bhg4c11u:89: yogeśvara tato me tvaṃ darśayātmānam avyayam ||4||
GE07bhg4c11u:90: śrīdharaḥ : na cāhaṃ draṣṭum icchāmīty etāvataiva tvayā tad-rūpaṃ darśayitavyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:94: mayārjunena tad-rūpaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaktyam iti yadi manyase |
GE07bhg4c11u:95: tatas tarhi tad-rūpavantam ātmānam avyayaṃ nityaṃ mama darśaya ||4||
GE07bhg4c11u:96: madhusūdanaḥ : draṣṭum ayogye kutas te didṛkṣety āsaṅkayāha manyasa iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:98: he prabho sarva-svāmin ! tat tavaiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ mayārjunena draṣṭum śakyam iti yadi manyase jānāsīcchasi vā |
GE07bhg4c11u:99_0: he yogeśvara sarveṣām aṇimādi-siddhi-śālināṃ yogānāṃ yoginām īśvara tatas tvad-icchā-vaśād
GE07bhg4c11u:99_1: eva me mahyam atyartham arthite tvaṃ parama-kāruṇiko darśaya cākṣuṣa-jñāna-viṣayī-kāraya
GE07bhg4c11u:101: yogeśvareti ayogyasyāpi mama tad-darśana-yogyatāyāṃ tava yogaiśvaryam eva kāraṇam iti bhāvaḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c11u:102: baladevaḥ : aiśvarya-darśane bhagavan-saṃmatiṃ gṛhṇāti manyase yadīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:104: he prabho sarva-svāmin ! yogeśvareti sambodhayann ayogyasya me tvad-darśane tvac-chaktir eva hetur iti vyañjayati ||4||
GE07bhg4c11u:108: paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:111: evaṃ prārthitaḥ sann atyadbhutaṃ rūpaṃ darśayiyan sāvadhāno bhavety evam arjunam abhimukhīkaroti śrī-bhagavān uvāca paśyeti caturbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:117: nānā aneke varṇā ākṛtayaś ca yeṣāṃ tāni nānā-varṇākṛtīni ||5||
GE07bhg4c11u:118: madhusūdanaḥ : evam atyanta-bhaktenārjunena prārthitaḥ san śrī-bhagavān uvāca paśyeti |
GE07bhg4c11u:119: atra krameṇa śloka-catuṣṭaye 'pi paśyety āvṛttyātyadbhuta-rūpāṇi darśayiṣyāmi tvaṃ sāvadhāno bhavety arjunam abhimukhīkaroti bhagavān |
GE07bhg4c11u:120_0: śataśo 'tha sahasraśa ity aparimitāni tāni ca nānā-vidhāny aneka-prakārāṇi divyāny
GE07bhg4c11u:120_1: atyadbhutāni nānā vilakṣaṇā varṇā nīla-pīta-divya-prakārās tathākṛtayaś cāvayava-saṃsthāna-viśeṣā
GE07bhg4c11u:120_2: yeṣāṃ tāni nānā-varṇākṛtīni ca me mama rūpāṇi paśya |
GE07bhg4c11u:124: tataś ca svāṃśasya prakṛty-antaryāmiṇaḥ prathama-puruṣasya sahasra-śīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt iti puruṣa-sūkta-proktaṃ rūpaṃ prathamam idaṃ darśayāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:125: paścāt prastutopayogitvena tasyaiva kāla-rūpatvam api jñāpayiṣyāmīti manasi vimṛṣyārjunaṃ prati sāvadhāno bhava ity abhimukhīkaroti |
GE07bhg4c11u:127: ekasminn api mat-svarūpe śataśo mat-svarūpāṇi mad-vibhūtīḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c11u:129_0: evam abhyarthito bhagavān prakṛty-antaryāmiṇaṃ sahasra-śirasaṃ praśāstṛtva-pradhānaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:129_1: devākāraṃ svāṃśaṃ pradarśayituṃ prakṛtopayogitvāt tatraiva kālātmakatāṃ ca bodhayitum
GE07bhg4c11u:130: paśyeti padāvṛttir darśanīyānāṃ rūpāṇām atyadbhutatva-dyotanārthā ca bodhyā |
GE07bhg4c11u:131: me mama sahasra-śīrṣākāreṇa bhāsamānasyaikasyaiva śatāni sahasrāṇi ca vibhūti-bhūtāni rūpāṇi paśya arhe loṭ tāni praṣṭum arho bhavety arthaḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c11u:134: paśyādityān vasūn rudrān aśvinau marutas tathā |
GE07bhg4c11u:139: adṛṣṭa-pūrvāṇi tvayā vānyena vā pūrvam adṛṣṭāni rūpāṇi |
GE07bhg4c11u:141: madhusūdanaḥ : divyāni rūpāṇi paśyety uktvā tāny eva leśato 'nukrāmati dvābhyām paśyeti |
GE07bhg4c11u:142: paśyādityān dvādaśa vasūn aṣṭau rudrān ekādaśa aśvinau dvau marutaḥ sapta-saptakān ekonapañcāśat |
GE07bhg4c11u:144: bahūny anyāny adṛṣṭa-pūrvāṇi pūrvam adṛṣṭāni manuṣya-loke tvayā tvatto 'nyena vā kenacit |
GE07bhg4c11u:145: paśyāścaryāṇy adbhutāni he bhārata ! atra śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ nānā-vidhānīty asya vivaraṇaṃ bahūnīti ādityany ity ādi ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:146: adṛṣṭa-pūrvāṇīti divyānīty asya āścaryāṇīti nānā-varṇākṛtīnīty asyeti draṣṭavyam ||6||
GE07bhg4c11u:149: kiṃ cedha mama dehe ekastham eka-deśa-sthitaṃ sa-carācaraṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagattvam adyādhunaiva paśya |
GE07bhg4c11u:150: yat tatra tatra paribhramatā tvayā varṣāyutair api draṣṭum aśakyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:152: yac ca jagad-āśraya-bhūtaṃ pradhāna-mahad-ādi-kāraṇa-svarūpaṃ sva-jaya-parājayādikaṃ cānyad draṣṭum icchāmi tad api paśya ||6||
GE07bhg4c11u:156: mama dehe guḍākeśa yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi ||7||
GE07bhg4c11u:158: tatra tatra paribhramatā varṣa-koṭibhir api draṣṭum aśakyaṃ kṛtsnam api carācara-sahitaṃ jagad ihāsmin mama dehe 'vayava-rūpeṇaikatraiva svitamadyādhunaiva paśya |
GE07bhg4c11u:159: yac cānyaj jagad-āśraya-bhūtaṃ kāraṇa-svarūpaṃ jagataś cāvasthā-viśeṣādikaṃ jaya-parājayādikaṃ ca yad apy anyad draṣṭum icchasi tat sarvaṃ paśya ||7||
GE07bhg4c11u:161: samastaṃ jagad api mad-deha-sthaṃ draṣṭum arhasīty āha ihaikastham iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:162_0: ihāsmin mama dehe eka-stham ekasminn evāvayava-rūpeṇa sthitaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ samastaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:162_1: sa-carācaram jaṅgama-sthāvara-sahitaṃ tatra tatra pariśramatā varṣa-koṭi-sahasreṇāpi
GE07bhg4c11u:162_2: draṣṭum aśakyam adyādhunaiva paśya he guḍākeśa ! yac cānyaj jaya-parājayādikaṃ draṣṭum
GE07bhg4c11u:163: viśvanāthaḥ : paribhramatā tvayā varṣa-koṭibhir api draṣṭum aśakyaṃ kṛtsnam api jagat |
GE07bhg4c11u:164: iha prastāva ekasminn api mad-dehāvayave tiṣṭhaty ekastham |
GE07bhg4c11u:165: yac cānyat sva-jaya-parājayādikaṃ ca mamāsmin dehe jagad-āśraya-bhūta-kāraṇa-rūpe ||7||
GE07bhg4c11u:167: kiṃ ceha mama dehe eka-stham eka-deśa-sthitaṃ sa-carācaraṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagat tvam adyādhunaiva paśya |
GE07bhg4c11u:168: yat tatra tatra paribhramatā tvayā varṣāyutair api draṣṭum aśakyaṃ tadaikadaivaikatraiva mad-anugrahād avalokas tvety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:169: yac ca jagad-āśraya-bhūtaṃ pradhāna-mahad-ādi-kāraṇa-svarūpaṃ sva-jaya-parājayādikaṃ cānyad draṣṭum icchasi tad api paśya ||7||
GE07bhg4c11u:172: na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭum anenaiva sva-cakṣuṣā |
GE07bhg4c11u:173: divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram ||8||
GE07bhg4c11u:174: śrīdharaḥ : yad uktam arjunena manyase yadi tac chakyam iti tatrāha na tu mām iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:175: anenaiva tu svīyena carma-cakṣuṣā māṃ draṣṭum na śakyase śakto na bhaviṣyasi |
GE07bhg4c11u:176: ato 'haṃ divyam alaukikaṃ jñānātmakaṃ cakṣus tubhyaṃ dadāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:177: mama aiśvaram asādhāraṇaṃ yogam yuktim aghaṭana-ghaṭanā-sāmarthyaṃ paśya ||8||
GE07bhg4c11u:178: madhusūdanaḥ : yat tūktaṃ manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti viśeṣaṇam āha na tu mām iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:179: anenaiva prākṛtena sva-cakṣuṣā svabhāva-siddhena cakṣuṣā māṃ divya-rūpaṃ draṣṭum na tu śakyase na śaknoṣi tu eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:180: śakyasa iti pāṭhe śakto na bhaviṣyasīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:181: sauvādikasyāpi śaknoter daivādikaḥ śyaṃś chāndas iti vā |
GE07bhg4c11u:183_0: tarhi tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ kathaṃ śaknuyām ata āha divyam aprākṛtaṃ mama divya-rūpa-darśana-kṣamaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:183_1: dadāmi te tubhyaṃ cakṣus tena divyena cakṣuṣā paśya me yogam aghaṭana-ghaṭanā-sāmarthyātiśayam
GE07bhg4c11u:184: viśvanāthaḥ : indram indrajālaṃ māyā-mayaṃ vā rūpam ity arjuna mā manyatāṃ,
GE07bhg4c11u:185: kintu sac-cid-ānanda-mayam eva svarūpam antarbhūta-sarva-jagatkam atīndriyatvenaiva viśvasitum ity etad artham āha na tv iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:186: anenaiva prākṛtena sva-cakṣuṣā māṃ cid-ghanākāraṃ draṣṭuṃ na śakyase na śaknoṣīty atas tubhyaṃ divyam aprākṛtaṃ cakṣur dadāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:187: tenaiva paśyete prākṛta-nara-māninam arjunaṃ kam api camatkāraṃ prāpayitum eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:188: yato hy arjuno bhagavat-pārṣada-mukhyatvān narāvatāratvāc ca prākṛta-nara iva na carma-cakṣukaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:189: kiṃ ca sākṣād-bhagavan-mādhuryam eva sa sva-cakṣuṣā sākṣād anubhavati so 'rjuno bhagavad-aṃśaṃ draṣṭuṃ tena aśaknuvan divyaṃ cakṣur gṛhṇīyād iti kaḥ khalu nyāyaḥ ?
GE07bhg4c11u:190: eke tv evam ācakṣate bhagavato nara-līlātva-mahāmādhuryaika-grāhi
GE07bhg4c11u:192: tac cakṣur ananya-bhakta iva bhagavato deva-līlātva-sampadaṃ naiva gṛhṇāti na hi sitopala-rasāsvādinī rasanā khaṇḍaṃ guḍaṃ vā svādayituṃ śaknoti |
GE07bhg4c11u:193: tasmād arjunāya tat prārthita-camatkāra-viśeṣaṃ dātuṃ deva-līlatvam aiśvaryaṃ jigrāhayiṣur bhagavān prema-rasān anukūlaṃ divyam amānuṣam eva cakṣur dadāv iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:195: baladevaḥ : manyase yadi tac chakyam ity arjuna-prārthitaṃ sampādayan nirataṃ,
GE07bhg4c11u:196: vismitaṃ kartuṃ tasmai sva-devākāra-grāhi divyaṃ cakṣur bhagavān dadāv ity āha na tu mām iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:197: anenaiva man-mādhuryaikāntena sva-cakṣuṣā yugapad-vibhāta-sahasra-sūrya-prakhyaṃ sahasra-śiraskaṃ māṃ draṣṭuṃ na śakyase na śaknoṣi |
GE07bhg4c11u:199: yathāham ātmānam atipravāhākrāntaṃ vyanadmi tathā tvac-cakṣuś ceti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:200: tena mamaiśvaraṃ yogaṃ rūpaṃ paśya yujyate 'nena iti vyutpatter yogo rūpaṃ paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram ity agrimāc ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:201: atra divyaṃ cakṣur eva dattaṃ na tu divyaṃ mano 'pīti bodhyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:203: tasya tad-rūpe ruci-prasaṅgād iha divya-dṛṣṭi-dānena liṅgena pārtha-sārathi-rūpāt sahasra-śiraso viśva-rūpasyādhikyam iti yad vadanti tat tv agre nirasyam ||8||
GE07bhg4c11u:207: evam uktvā tato rājan mahā-yogeśvaro hariḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:208: darśayām āsa pārthāya paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram ||9||
GE07bhg4c11u:209: śrīdharaḥ : evam uktvā bhagavān arjunāya svarūpaṃ darśitavān |
GE07bhg4c11u:210: tac ca rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvārjunaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ vijñāpitavān itīmam arthaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ ślokair dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ prati sañjaya uvāca evam uktveti |
GE07bhg4c11u:211: he rājan dhṛtarāṣṭra ! mahān cāsau yogeśvaraś ca hariḥ paramam aiśvaraṃ rūpam darśitavān ||9||
GE07bhg4c11u:212: madhusūdanaḥ : bhagavān arjunāya divyaṃ rūpaṃ darśitavān |
GE07bhg4c11u:213: sa ca tad dṛṣṭvā vismayāviṣṭo bhagavantaṃ vijñāpitavān itīmaṃ vṛttāntam evam uktvety ādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ślokair dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ prati saṃjaya uvāceti |
GE07bhg4c11u:214: evam na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭum anena cakṣuṣā divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣur ity uktvā tato divya-cakṣuḥ-pradānād anantaraṃ he rājan dhṛtarāṣṭra sthiro bhava śravaṇāya |
GE07bhg4c11u:215_0: mahān sarvotkṛṣṭaś cāsau yogeśvaraś ceti mahā-yogeśvaro harir bhaktānāṃ sarva-kleśāpahārī
GE07bhg4c11u:215_1: bhagavān darśanāyogyaṃ api darśayāmāsa pārthāyaikānta-bhaktāya paramaṃ divyaṃ rūpam aiśvaram ||9 ||
GE07bhg4c11u:217: baladevaḥ : evam uktvā hariḥ pārthāya viśva-rūpaṃ darśitavān |
GE07bhg4c11u:218: tac ca rūpaṃ vīkṣya pārtho harim evaṃ vijñāpitavān itīmam arthaṃ sañjayaḥ prāha evam ṣaḍbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:219: tato divya-cakṣur dānānantaraṃ he rājan dhṛtarāṣṭra ! mahāṃś cāsau yogeśvaraś ca hariḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c11u:226: śrīdharaḥ : kathambhūtaṃ tad iti ? ata āha aneka-vaktra-nayanam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:227: anekāni vaktrāṇi nayanāni ca yasmiṃs tat |
GE07bhg4c11u:230: divyāny anekāny udyatāny āyudhāni yasmiṃs tat ||10||
GE07bhg4c11u:232: divyāni mālyāni ambarāṇi ca dhārayatīti tat |
GE07bhg4c11u:233: tathā divyo gandho yasya tādṛśaṃ anulepanaṃ yasya tat |
GE07bhg4c11u:238: madhusūdanaḥ : tad eva rūpaṃ viśinaṣṭi aneketi |
GE07bhg4c11u:239: anekāni vaktrāṇi nayanāni ca yasmin rūpe |
GE07bhg4c11u:242: divyāny anekāny udyatāny āyudhāni astrāṇi yasmiṃs tat tathārūpam |
GE07bhg4c11u:243: divyāni mālyāni puṣpa-mayāni ratnamayāni ca tathā divyāmbarāṇi vastrāṇi ca dhriyante yena tad-divya-mālyāmbara-dharaṃ |
GE07bhg4c11u:244: divyo gandho 'syeti divya-gandhas tad-anulepanam yasya tat |
GE07bhg4c11u:247: anantam aparicchinnaṃ viśvataḥ sarvato mukhāni yasmiṃs tad-rūpaṃ darśayāmāseti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:249: viśvanāthaḥ : viśvataḥ sarvato mukhāni yasya tat ||11||
GE07bhg4c11u:251: aneketi anekāni sahasrāṇi vaktrāṇi nayanāni ca yasya tad-rūpaṃ sahasra-bāho bhava viśva-mūrte ity agrima-vākyāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:253: viśvataś cakṣur uta viśvatomukhaḥ ity ādi-jñāpakāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:254: anekānām adbhutānāṃ darśanam yatra tat divyo gandho yatra tādṛg anulepanaṃ yasya tat |
GE07bhg4c11u:255: devaṃ dyotamānam anantam apāraṃ viśvataḥ sarvato mukhāni yasya tat ||10-11||
GE07bhg4c11u:259: yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c11u:262: sūrya-sahasrasya yugapad utthitasya yadi yugapad utthitā bhāḥ prabhā bhavet tarhi sā tadā mahātmano viśvarūpasya bhāsaḥ prabhāyā kathañcit sadṛśī syāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:265: madhusūdanaḥ : devam ity uktaṃ vivṛṇoti divīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:266_0: divi antarikṣe sūryāṇāṃ sahasrasyāparimita-sūrya-samūhasya yugapad uditasya yugapad
GE07bhg4c11u:266_1: utthitā bhāḥ prabhā yadi bhavet tadā sā tasya mahātmano viśvarūpasya bhāso dīpteḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:266_2: sadṛśī tulyā yadi syād yadi vā na syāt tato 'pi nūnaṃ viśvarūpasyaiva bhā atiricyetety ahaṃ manye |
GE07bhg4c11u:268_1: utprekṣā vyañjayantī sarvathā nirupamatvam eva vyanakti ubhau yadi vyomni pṛthak-pravāhāv ity ādivat ||12 ||
GE07bhg4c11u:270: ekadaiva yadi bhāḥ kāntir utthitā bhavet tadā tasya mahātmano viśvarūpa-puruṣasya bhāsaḥ prabhāyāḥ kānteḥ kathañcit sadṛśī bhavet ||12||
GE07bhg4c11u:272: divi ākāśe yugapad utthitasya sūrya-sahasrasya bhāḥ kāntiś ced yugapad utthitā bhavet tarhi sā tasya mahātmano viśva-rūpasya harer bhāsa ekasyāḥ kānteḥ sadṛśī syāt tadeti |
GE07bhg4c11u:275: vyaṅgā satī sarvathā tat-kānter nairupamyaṃ vyañjayati |
GE07bhg4c11u:281: śrīdharaḥ : tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyām āha saṃjayaḥ tatreti |
GE07bhg4c11u:282: anekadhā pravibhaktaṃ nānā-vibhāgenāvasthitaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagad devadevasya śarīre tad-avayavatvenaikatraivaa pṛthag-avasthitaṃ tadā pāṇḍavo 'rjuno 'paśyat ||13||
GE07bhg4c11u:284: ihaikasthaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ paśyādya sa-carācaram iti bhagavad-ājñaptam apy anubhūtavān arjuna ity āha tatraikastham iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:285: ekastham ekatra sthitaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ pravibhaktam anekadhā |
GE07bhg4c11u:286: deva-pitṛ-manuṣyādi-nānā-prakārair apaśyad devadevasya bhagavataḥ tatra viśvarūpe śarīre pāṇḍavo 'rjunas tadā viśvarūpāścarya-darśana-daśāyām ||13||
GE07bhg4c11u:288: tatra tasmin yuddha-bhumāv eva devadevasya śarīre jagat brahmāṇḍaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sarvam eva gaṇayitum aśakyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:289: pravibhaktaṃ pṛthak pṛthaktayā sthitam ekastham ekadeśasthaṃ pratiromakūpasthaṃ pratikukṣisthaṃ vety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:290: anekadhā mṛnmayaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ maṇimayaṃ vā pañcāśat-koṭi-yojana-pramāṇaṃ śata-koṭi-yojana-pramāṇaṃ lakṣa-koṭy-ādi-yojana-pramāṇaṃ vety arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c11u:291: baladevaḥ : tataḥ kim abhūd ity apekṣāyām āha tatreti |
GE07bhg4c11u:292: tatra yuddha-bhūmau devadevasya kṛṣṇasya vyañjita-sahasra-śiraske śarīre śrī-vigrahe kṛtsnaṃ nikhilaṃ jagad brahmāṇḍaṃ tadā pāṇḍavo 'paśyat |
GE07bhg4c11u:294: anekadheti mṛṇmayaṃ svarṇa-mayaṃ ratna-mayaṃ vā laghu-madhye bṛhad-bhūtaṃ vety arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c11u:299: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃ kṛtavān iti ? tatrāha tata iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:301: visamyenāviṣṭo vyāptaḥ san hṛṣṭāny utpulakitāni romāṇi yasya sa dhanañjayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:302: tam eva devaṃ śirasā praṇamya kṛtāñjaliḥ sampuṭākṛta-hasto bhūtvā |
GE07bhg4c11u:304: madhusūdanaḥ : evam adbhuta-darśane 'py arjuno na vibhayāṃcakāra nāpi netre saṃcacāra,
GE07bhg4c11u:310_0: ataeva hṛṣṭa-romā pulakitaḥ san sa prakhyāta-mahādeva-saṅgrāmādi-prabhāvo dhanaṃjayo
GE07bhg4c11u:310_1: yudhiṣṭhira-rājasūya uttara-go-grahe ca sarvātrājño jitvā dhanam āhṛtavān iti prathita-mahā-parākramo
GE07bhg4c11u:311: devaṃ tam eva viśvarūpa-dharaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ śirasā bhūmi-lagnena praṇamya prakarṣeṇa bhakti-śraddhātiśayena natvā namaskṛtya kṛtāñjaliḥ sampuṭīkṛta-hasta-yugaḥ sann
GE07bhg4c11u:313_1: sāttvika-romaharṣeṇa namaskāreṇāñjali-kareṇa ca vyabhicāriṇā cānubhāvākṣiptena vā
GE07bhg4c11u:313_2: dhṛti-mati-harṣa-vitarkādinā paripoṣāt sa-vāsanānāṃ śrotṝṇāṃ tādṛśaś citta-camatkāro
GE07bhg4c11u:313_3: 'pi tad-bhedānadhyavasāyāt paripoṣaṃ gataḥ paramānandāsvāda-rūpeṇādbhuta-raso bhavatīti sūcitam ||14 ||
GE07bhg4c11u:316: evaṃ kṛṣṇa-tattvavid arjunas tasmin sattvena jñātaṃ sahasra-śīrṣatvam adhunā vīkṣyādbhutaṃ rasam anvabhūd ity āha tata iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:318: dhanaṃjayeti dhīro 'pi vismayenāviṣṭo hṛṣṭa-romā pulakito devaṃ śirasā bhū-lagnena praṇamya kṛtāñjaliḥ sann abhāṣata |
GE07bhg4c11u:319: atra bhaya-netra-saṃvaraṇādikaṃ tasya nābhūt kintv adbhuto raso 'bhyudaid iti vyañjate |
GE07bhg4c11u:320: iha tādṛśo harir ālambano muhur muhus tad-vīkṣaṇam uddīpanaṃ praṇati-pāṇi-yogāv anubhāvau,
GE07bhg4c11u:321: romāñcaḥ sāttvikas tair ākṣiptā matir dhṛti-harṣādayaḥ sañcāriṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:329: ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān uragāṃś ca divyān ||15||
GE07bhg4c11u:331: he deva ! tava dehe devānām ādityādīn paśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:332: tathā sarvān bhūta-viśeṣāṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ jaṅgamānāṃ ca nānā-saṃsthānānāṃ saṃghān samūhān |
GE07bhg4c11u:333: tathā brahmāṇam caturmukham īśam īśitāraṃ sarveṣāṃ kamalāsana-stham pṛthvī-padma-madhye meru-karṇikāsana-sthaṃ bhagavan-nābhi-kamalāsanastham iti vā |
GE07bhg4c11u:334: tathā ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān vaśiṣṭādīn brahma-putrān |
GE07bhg4c11u:335: uragāṃś ca divyān prākṛtān vāsuki-prabhṛtīn paśyāmīti sarvatrānvayaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c11u:337: yad bhagavatā darśitaṃ viśvarūpaṃ tad bhagavad-dattena divyena cakṣuṣā sarva-lokādṛśyam api paśyāmy aho mama bhāgya-prakarṣa iti svānubhavam āviṣkurvan arjuna uvāca paśyāmīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:338: paśyāmi cākṣuṣa-jñāna-viṣayīkaromi he deva tava dehe viśvarūpe devān vasv-ādīn sarvān |
GE07bhg4c11u:339: tathā bhūta-viśeṣāṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ jaṅgamānāṃ ca nānā-saṃsthānānāṃ saṃghān samūhān |
GE07bhg4c11u:340: tathā brahmāṇam caturmukham īśam īśitāraṃ sarveṣāṃ kamalāsana-stham pṛthvī-padma-madhye meru-karṇikāsana-sthaṃ bhagavan-nābhi-kamalāsanastham iti vā |
GE07bhg4c11u:341: tathā ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān vaśiṣṭādīn brahma-putrān |
GE07bhg4c11u:342: uragāṃś ca divyān prākṛtān vāsuki-prabhṛtīn paśyāmīti sarvatrānvayaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c11u:345: baladevaḥ : kim abhāṣata tad āha paśyāmīti saptadaśabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:347: brahmāṇam caturmukham kamalāsane caturmukhe sthitam tad-antaryāmiṇam īśam garbhodaka-śayam urugān vāsuky-ādīn sarpān ||15||
GE07bhg4c11u:352: nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punas tavādiṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:355: anekāni bāhv-ādīni yasya tādṛśaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:356: anantāni rūpāṇi yasya taṃ tvāṃ sarvataḥ paśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:357: tava tvaṃ taṃ madhyamādiṃ ca na paśyāmi ||16||
GE07bhg4c11u:358: madhusūdanaḥ : yatra bhagavad-dehe sarvam idaṃ dṛṣṭavān, tam eva viśinaṣṭi aneketi |
GE07bhg4c11u:359: bāhava udarāṇi vaktrāṇi netrāṇi cānekāni yasya tam aneka-bāhūdara-vaktra-netraṃ paśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:360: tvā tvāṃ sarvataḥ sarvatrānantāni rūpāṇi yasyeti taṃ |
GE07bhg4c11u:361: tava tu punar nāntam avasānaṃ na madhyaṃ nāpy ādiṃ paśyāmi sarva-gatatvāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:362: he viśveśvara ! he viśva-rūpa ! sambodhana-dvayam atisambhramāt ||16||
GE07bhg4c11u:364: baladevaḥ : yatra dehe devādīn dṛṣṭavāṃs taṃ viśinaṣṭi aneketi |
GE07bhg4c11u:376: sarvato dīptimantam tejaḥ-puñja-rūpaṃ tathā durnirīkṣyaṃ draṣṭum aśakyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:377: tatra hetuḥ - dīptayor analārkayor dyutir iva dyutis tejo yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c11u:378: ataevāprameyam evaṃbhūta iti niścetum aśakyaṃ tvāṃ samantataḥ paśyāmi ||17||
GE07bhg4c11u:379: madhusūdanaḥ : tam eva viśvarūpaṃ bhagavantaṃ prakārānantaraṃ viśinaṣṭi kirīṭinam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:380: kirīṭa-gadā-cakra-dhāriṇaṃ ca sarvato dīptimantam tejo-rāśiṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:381: ataeva durnirīkṣyaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā vinā nirīkṣitum aśakyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:384: dīptayor analārkayor dyutir iva dyutir yasya tam aprameyam iti paricchettum aśakyaṃ samantāt sarvataḥ paśyāmi divyena cakṣuṣā |
GE07bhg4c11u:387: baladevaḥ : vidhāntareṇa tam eva viśinaṣṭi kirīṭinam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:388: durnirīkṣyam api tvām ahaṃ paśyāmi tat-prasādād divya-cakṣur-lābhāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:390: aprameyam idam ittham iti pramātum aśakyam ||17||
GE07bhg4c11u:397: śrīdharaḥ : yasmād evaṃ tavātakaiśvaryaṃ tasmāt tvam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:406: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ tavātarkya-niratiśayiśvarya-darśanād anuminomi tvam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:407: tvam evākṣaraṃ paramaṃ brahma veditavyaṃ mumukṣubhir vedānta-śravaṇādinā |
GE07bhg4c11u:408: tvam evāsya viśvasya paraṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ nidhīyate 'sminn iti nidhānam āśrayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:413: ataeva sanātanaś cirantanaḥ puruṣo yaḥ paramātmā sa eva tvaṃ me mato vidito 'si ||18||
GE07bhg4c11u:414: viśvanāthaḥ : veditavyaṃ muktair jñeyam yad akṣaraṃ brahma-tattvam | nidhānaṃ laya-sthānam ||18||
GE07bhg4c11u:415: baladevaḥ : acintya-mahaiśvarya-vīkṣaṇāt tvam aham evaṃ niścinomīty āha tvam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:416: atha parā yayā tad akṣaram adhigamyate,
GE07bhg4c11u:417_0: yat tad adṛśyam [MuṇḍU 1.5-6] ity ādi-vedānta-vākyair veditavyaṃ yat paramaṃ sa-śrīkam

GE07bhg4c11u:693: ataeva namo 'stu te tubhyaṃ sarva-gurave he deva-vara prasīda prasādaṃ kraurya-tyāgaṃ kuru |
GE07bhg4c11u:694: vijñātum viśeṣeṇa jñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyaṃ sarva-kāraṇaṃ,
GE07bhg4c11u:695: na hi yasmāt tava sakhāpi san prajānāmi tava pravṛttim ceṣṭām ||31||
GE07bhg4c11u:698: evaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ vyañjita-kāla-śaktiṃ bhagavantam upavarṇya tat-tattva-vid apy arjunaḥ sva-jñāna-dārḍhyāya pṛcchati ākhyāhīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:699: darśayātmānam avyayam iti sahasra-śīrṣādi-lakṣaṇam aiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ darśayitum arthitena bhagavatā tad-rūpaṃ pradarśya tasya punar atighorā saṃhartṛtā pradarśyate |
GE07bhg4c11u:700: tatrogra-rūpo bhavān ka ity ākhyāhi kathaya |
GE07bhg4c11u:703: ādyaṃ bhavantam ahaṃ viśeṣeṇa jñātum icchāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:704: tava pravṛttiṃ ceṣṭāṃ ca na hi prajānāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:705: kim artham evaṃ pravṛtto 'sīti tat-prayojanaṃ cākhyāhīti ||31||
GE07bhg4c11u:713: śrīdharaḥ : evam prārthitaḥ san bhagavān uvāca kāla iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:715: lokān prāṇinaḥ saṃhartum iha loke pravṛtto 'smi |
GE07bhg4c11u:716: ata ṛte 'pi tvāṃ hantāraṃ vināpi na bhaviṣyanti na jīviṣyanti |
GE07bhg4c11u:717: yadyapi tvayā na hantavyā ete tathāpi mayā kālātmanā grastāḥ santo mariṣyanty eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:718: ke te ? pratyanīkeṣu anīkāni anīkāni prati |
GE07bhg4c11u:719: bhīṣma-droṇādīnāṃ sarvāsu senāsu ye yodhāro 'vasthitās te sarve 'pi ||32||
GE07bhg4c11u:721: evam arjunena prārthito yaḥ svayaṃ yad-arthā ca sva-pravṛttis tat sarvaṃ tribhir ślokaiḥ kālo 'smīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:722: kālaḥ kriyā-śakty-upahitaḥ sarvasya saṃhartā parameśvaro 'smi bhavāmīdānīṃ pravṛddho vṛddhiṃ gataḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:723: yad-arthaṃ pravṛttas tac chṛṇu lokān samāhartum bhakṣayituṃ pravṛtto 'ham ihāsmin kāle |
GE07bhg4c11u:724: mat-pravṛttiṃ vinā katham evaṃ syād iti cen nety āha |
GE07bhg4c11u:725_0: ṛte 'pi tvā tvām arjunaṃ yoddhāraṃ vināpi tvad-vyāpāraṃ vināpi mad-vyāpāreṇaiva na
GE07bhg4c11u:725_1: bhaviṣyanti vinaṅkṣyanti sarve bhīṣma-droṇa-karṇa-prabhṛtayo yoddhum anarhatvena
GE07bhg4c11u:725_2: sambhāvitā anye 'pi ye 'vasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu pratipakṣa-sainyeṣu yodhā yodhāraḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:725_3: sarve 'pi mayā hatatvād eva na bhaviṣyanti |
GE07bhg4c11u:728: baladevaḥ : evam arthito bhagavān uvāca kālo 'smīti | pravṛddho vyāpī |
GE07bhg4c11u:729: yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca ubhe bhavata odanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:730: mṛtyur yasyopasecanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra saḥ || [KaṭhU 1.2.25]
GE07bhg4c11u:731: iti śrutyā yaḥ kīrtyate sa kālo 'ham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:732: iha samaye lokān duryodhanādīn samāhartuṃ grasituṃ pravṛttaṃ māṃ mat-pravṛtti-phalaṃ ca jānīhi |
GE07bhg4c11u:733: tvām api yudhiṣṭhirādīṃś ca ṛte sarve na bhaviṣyanti na jīviṣyanti |
GE07bhg4c11u:734: yad vā, nanu raṇān nivṛtte mayi teṣāṃ kathaṃ kṣayaḥ syād iti cet tatrāha ṛte 'pīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:735: tvāṃ yodhāram ṛte tvad-yuddha-vyāpāraṃ vināpi sarve na bhaviṣyanti mariṣyanty eva kālātmanā mayā teṣāṃ āyur-haraṇāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:736: ke te sarve ity āha pratyanīkeṣu paramparayor ye bhīṣmādayo 'vasthitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:737: yuddhān nivṛttasya tava tu svadharma-cyutir eva bhaved iti ||32||
GE07bhg4c11u:746: devair api durjayā bhīṣmādayo 'rjunena nirjitā ity evaṃ bhūtaṃ yaśo labhasva prāpnuhi |
GE07bhg4c11u:747: ayatnataś ca śatrūn jitvā samṛddhaṃ rājyam bhuṅkṣva |

GE07bhg4c11u:750: he savyasācin ! savyena hastena sācituṃ śarān saṃdhātuṃ śīlaṃ yasyeti vyutpattyā vāmenāpi vāṇa-kṣepāt savyasācīty ucyate ||33||
GE07bhg4c11u:752_0: tasmāt tvad-vyāpāram antareṇāpi yasmād ete vinaṅkṣanty eva tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭhodyukto
GE07bhg4c11u:752_1: bhava yuddhāya devair api durjayā bhīṣma-droṇādayo 'tirathā jhaṭity evārjunena nirjitā
GE07bhg4c11u:753: mahadbhiḥ puṇyair eva hi yaśo labhyate |
GE07bhg4c11u:754: ayatnataś ca jitvā śatrūn duryodhanādīn bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ svopasarjanatvena bhogyatāṃ prāpaya samṛddhaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam |
GE07bhg4c11u:755: ete ca tava śatravo mayaiva kālātmanā nihatāḥ saṃhṛtāyuṣas tvadīya-yuddhāt pūrvam eva kevalaṃ tava yaśo-lābhāya rathān na pātitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:756_0: atas tvaṃ nimitta-mātram arjunenaite nirjitā iti sārvalaukika-kavy-apadeśāspadaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:756_1: bhava he savyasācin savyena vāmena hastenāpi śarān sacituṃ saṃdhātuṃ śīlaṃ yasya
GE07bhg4c11u:757: tvad-vyāpārānantaraṃ mayā rathāt pātyamāneṣv eteṣu tavaiva kartṛtvaṃ lokāḥ kalpayiṣyantīty abhiprāyaḥ ||33||
GE07bhg4c11u:760: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha svadharmāya yuddhāya yaśo labhasva sura-durjayā bhīṣmādayo 'rjunena helayaiva nirjitā iti durlabhāṃ kīrtiṃ prāpnuhi |
GE07bhg4c11u:761: pūrvaṃ draupadyām aparādha-samaya eva mayaite nihatās tvad-yaśase yantra-pratimāvat pravartante |
GE07bhg4c11u:763: he savyasācin ! savyenāpi hastena bāṇān sacituṃ saṃdhātuṃ śīlaṃ asyeti yuddha-nirbhare prāpte hastābhyām iṣu-varṣinn ity arthaḥ ||33||
GE07bhg4c11u:766: droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c11u:768: mayā hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi mā vyathiṣṭhā
GE07bhg4c11u:771: na caite vidmaḥ kataran no garīyo yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ ity āśaṅkā sāpi na kāryety āha droṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:772: yebhyas tvaṃ śaṅkase tān droṇādīn mayaiva hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi ghātaya |
GE07bhg4c11u:774: sapatnān śatrūn raṇe yuddhe niścitaṃ jetāsi jeṣyasi ||34||
GE07bhg4c11u:776_0: nanu droṇo brāhmaṇottamo dhanurvedācāryo mama guru viśeṣeṇa ca divyāstra-sampannas
GE07bhg4c11u:776_1: tathā bhīṣmaḥ svacchanda-mṛtyur divyāstra-sampannaś ca parāśurāmeṇa dvandva-yuddham
GE07bhg4c11u:776_2: upagamyāpi na parājitas tathā yasya pitā vṛddha-kṣatras tapaś carati mama putrasya
GE07bhg4c11u:776_3: śiro yo bhūmau pātayiṣyati tasyāpi śiras tat-kālaṃ bhūmau patiṣyatīti sa jayadratho
GE07bhg4c11u:776_4: 'pi jetum aśakyaḥ svayam api mahādevārādhana-paro divyāstra-sampannaś ca tathā karṇo
GE07bhg4c11u:776_5: 'pi svayaṃ sūrya-samas tad-ārādhanena divyāstra-sampannaś ca vāsava-dattayā caika-puruṣa-ghātinyā
GE07bhg4c11u:776_6: moghīkartum aśakyayā śaktyā śaktyā viśiṣṭas tathā kṛpāśvatthāma-bhūriśravaḥ-prabhṛtayo
GE07bhg4c11u:776_7: mahānubhāvāḥ sarvathā durjayā evaiteṣu satsu kathaṃ jitvā śatrūn rājyaṃ bhokṣye kathaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:776_8: vā yaśo lapsya ity āśaṅkām arjunasyāpanetum
GE07bhg4c11u:777: āha tad āśaṅkā-viṣayān nāmabhiḥ kathayan droṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:778: droṇādīṃs tvad-āśaṅkā-viṣayī-bhūtān sarvān eva yodha-vīrān kālātmanā mayā hatān eva tvaṃ jahi |
GE07bhg4c11u:780: ato mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ katham evaṃ śakṣyāmīti vyathāṃ bhaya-nimittāṃ pīḍāṃ mā gā bhayaṃ tyaktvā yudhyasva |
GE07bhg4c11u:781: jetāsi jeṣyasy acireṇaiva raṇe saṅgrāme sapatnān sarvān api śatrūn |
GE07bhg4c11u:782: atra droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ceti ca-kāra-trayeṇa pūrvoktājeyatva-śaṅkānūdyate |
GE07bhg4c11u:785: tasmāt kuto 'pi svasya parājayaṃ vadha-nimittaṃ pāpaṃ ca mā śaṅkiṣṭhā ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:786: kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye droṇaṃ ca madhusūdana |
GE07bhg4c11u:787: iṣubhiḥ pratiyotsyāmi pūjārhau ity atrevātrāpi samudāyānvayān antaraṃ pratyekānvayo draṣṭavyaḥ ||34||
GE07bhg4c11u:790: yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ iti sva-vijaye saṃśayam ākārṣīr ity āśayenāha droṇaṃ ceti |
GE07bhg4c11u:791: mayā hatān hatāyuṣo droṇādīṃs tvaṃ jahi māraya |
GE07bhg4c11u:793: katham etān divyāstra-sampannān ekaḥ śaknomy ahaṃ vijetum iti bhayaṃ mā gāḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:794: mṛtānāṃ māraṇe kaḥ śrama ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:795: bhayaṃ hitvā yudhyasva raṇa sapatnān ripūn jetāsi jeṣyasi ||34||
GE07bhg4c11u:803: śrīdharaḥ : tato yad vṛttaṃ tad eva dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ prati saṃjaya uvāca etad iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:804: etat pūrva-śloka-trayātmakaṃ keśavasya vacanaṃ śrutvā vepamānaḥ kampamānaḥ kirīṭy arjunaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ sampuṭīkṛta-hastaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ namaskṛtya punar apy āhoktavān |
GE07bhg4c11u:806: harṣa-bhayādy-āveśa-vaśāt gadgadena kaṇṭha-kampanena saha vartate iti sa-gadgadaṃ yathā syāt tathā |
GE07bhg4c11u:807: kiṃ ca bhītād api bhītaḥ san praṇamyāvanato bhūtvā ||35||
GE07bhg4c11u:809_0: droṇa-bhīṣma-jayadratha-karṇeṣu jayāśā-viṣayeṣu hateṣu nirāśrayo duryodhano hata
GE07bhg4c11u:809_1: evety anusandhāya jayāśāṃ parityajya yadi dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ sandhiṃ kuryāt tadā śāntir
GE07bhg4c11u:809_2: ubhayeṣāṃ bhaved ity abhiprāyavāṃs tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyāṃ saṃjaya uvāca etad iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:810_0: etat pūrvoktaṃ keśavasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛtāñjaliḥ kirīṭīndra-datta-kirīṭaḥ parama-vīratvena
GE07bhg4c11u:810_1: prasiddho vepamānaḥ paramāścarya-darśana-janitena sambhrameṇa kampamāno 'rjunaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:810_2: bhaktāgha-karṣaṇaṃ bhagavantaṃ namaskṛtvā namaskṛtya bhūyaḥ punar apy āhoktavān sa-gadgadaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:810_3: bhayena harṣeṇa cāśru-pūrṇa-netratve sati kapha-ruddha-kaṇṭhatayā vāco mandatva-sakampatvādir
GE07bhg4c11u:812: pūrvaṃ namaskṛtya punar api praṇamyātyanta-namro bhūtvāheti sambandhaḥ ||35||
GE07bhg4c11u:814: baladevaḥ : tato yad abhūt tat saṃjaya uvāca etad iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:815: keśavasyaitat padya-trayātmakaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā kirīṭī pārthaḥ vepamāno 'tyadbhutātyugra-rūpa-darśanajena sambhrameṇa sakampaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:819: bhīta-bhīto 'tibhayākulaḥ san bhūyaḥ punaar apy āha sa-gadgadaṃ gadgadena kaṇṭha-kampena sahitaṃ yathā syāt tathā ||35||
GE07bhg4c11u:828: sthāne ity avyayaṃ yuktam ity asminn arthe |
GE07bhg4c11u:829: he hṛṣīkeśa yata evaṃ tvam adbhuta-prabhāvo bhakta-vatsalaś ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:830: atas tava prakīrtyā māhātmya-saṅkīrtanena na kevalam aham eva prahṛṣyāmīti,
GE07bhg4c11u:831: kintu jagat sarvaṃ prahṛṣyaty prakarṣeṇa harṣaṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c11u:832: etat tu sthāne yuktam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:833: tathā jagad anurajyate cānurāgam upaitīti yat |
GE07bhg4c11u:835: diśaḥ prati dravanti palāyante iti yat |
GE07bhg4c11u:836: sarve yoga-tapo-mantrādi-siddhānāṃ saṅghā namasyanti praṇamanti iti yat |
GE07bhg4c11u:839: madhusūdanaḥ : ekādaśabhir arjuna uvāca sthāna iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:840: sthāna ity avyayaṃ yuktam ity arthe |
GE07bhg4c11u:841_0: he hṛṣīkeśa ! sarvendriya-pravartaka yatas tvam evam atyantādbhuta-prabhāvo bhakta-vatsalaś
GE07bhg4c11u:841_1: ca tatas tava prakīrtyā prakṛṣṭayā kīrtyā niratiśaya-prāśastyasya kīrtanena śravaṇena
GE07bhg4c11u:841_2: ca na kevalam aham eva prahṛṣyāmi kintu sarvam eva jagac cetana-mātraṃ rakṣo-virodhi
GE07bhg4c11u:841_3: prahṛṣyati prakṛṣṭaṃ harṣam āpnotīti yat tat sthāne yuktam evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:842: tathā sarvaṃ jagad anurajyate ca tad-viṣayam anurāgam upaitīti ca yat tad api yuktam eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:843: tathā rakṣāṃsi bhītāni bhayāviṣṭāni santi diśo dravanti gacchanti sarvāsu dikṣu palāyanta iti yat tad api yuktam eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:844: tathā sarve siddhānāṃ kapilādīnāṃ saṃghā namasyanti ceti yat tad api yuktam eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:845: sarvatra tava prakīrtyety asyānvayaḥ sthāna ity asya ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:848: sa ca nārāyaṇāṣṭākṣara-sudarśanāstra-mantrābhyāṃ sampuṭito jñeya iti rahasyam ||36||
GE07bhg4c11u:850: bhagavad-vigrahasyātiprasannatvam atighoratvaṃ cedam unmukha-vimukha-viṣayakam iti sahaseva jñātvā tad eva tattvaṃ vyācakṣaṇaḥ stauti sthāna iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:851: sthāna ity avyayaṃ yuktam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:852_0: he hṛṣīkeśa ! sva-bhaktendriyānāṃ ca svābhimukhye sva-mukhye ca pravartaka ! tava
GE07bhg4c11u:852_1: prakīrtyā prakṛṣṭayā tvan-māhātmya-saṅkīrtanena jagad idaṃ prahṛṣyay anurajyate anuraktam
GE07bhg4c11u:852_2: bhavatīti yuktam eva jagato 'sya tvad-aunmukhyād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:853: tathā rakṣāṃsi rakṣo 'sura-dānava-piśācādīni bhītāni bhūtvā diśo dravanti diśaḥ prati palāyanta ity etad api sthāne yuktam eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:855: tathā tvad-bhaktyā ye siddhās teṣāṃ saṅghāḥ sarve namasyanti cety api yuktam eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:860_0: pareśasya sakhyuḥ kṛṣṇasyātiramyatvam atyugratvaṃ ca tatra raṅgavad yugapad eva vīkṣya
GE07bhg4c11u:860_1: tad-ubhayaṃ sva-saṃmukha-sva-vimukha-viṣayam iti vidvān arjunas tad-anurūpaṃ stauti
GE07bhg4c11u:861: yuktam ity arthakaṃ sthāna ity ed-antam avyayam |
GE07bhg4c11u:862: he hṛṣīkeśeti saṃmukha-vimukhendriyāṇāṃ sāṃmukhye vaimukhye capravarakety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:863: yuddha-darśanāyāgataṃ deva-gandharva-siddha-vidyādhara-pramukhaṃ tvat-saṃmukhaṃ jagat tava duṣṭa-saṃhartatva-rūpayā prakīrtyā prahṛṣyaty anurajyate ceti yuktam etat |
GE07bhg4c11u:864: duṣṭa-svabhāvāni tvad-vimukhāni rakṣāṃsi rākṣasāsura-dānavādīni devādy-udgītayā tat-prakīrtyā bhītāni bhūtvā diśaḥ prati dravanti palāyanta iti ca yuktam |
GE07bhg4c11u:867: tava vīkṣya tvad-bhaktāḥ siddha-saṅghāḥ sarve sanakādayo namasyanti jaya jaya bhagavān ity udīrayantaḥ praṇamanti ca yuktaṃ tava bhakta-mano-hāritvāt ||36||
GE07bhg4c11u:870: kasmāc ca te na nameran mahātman
GE07bhg4c11u:873: tvam akṣaraṃ sad asat tatparaṃ yat ||37||
GE07bhg4c11u:874: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetum āha kasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:875: he mahātman ! he ananta ! he deveśa ! he jagannivāsa ! kasmād dhetos te tubhyaṃ na nameran na namaskāraṃ kuryuḥ ?
GE07bhg4c11u:878: kiṃ ca sad vyaktam asad-vyaktaṃ tābhyāṃ paraṃ mūla-kāraṇaṃ yad akṣaraṃ brahma |
GE07bhg4c11u:880: etair navabhir hetubhis tvāṃ sarve namasyantīti na citram ity arthaḥ ||37||
GE07bhg4c11u:881: madhusūdanaḥ : bhagavato harṣādi-viṣayatve hetum āha kasmāc ceti |
GE07bhg4c11u:882: kasmāc ca hetos te tubhyaṃ na nameran na namaskuryuḥ siddha-saṅghāḥ sarve 'pi |
GE07bhg4c11u:883_0: he mahātman paramodāra-citta ! he 'nanta sarva-pariccheda-śūnya ! he deveśa hiraṇyagarbhādīnām
GE07bhg4c11u:883_1: api devānāṃ niyantaḥ ! he jagan-nivāsa sarvāśraya ! tubhyaṃ kīdṛśāya brahmaṇo 'pi
GE07bhg4c11u:884_0: niyantṛtvam upadeṣṭṛtvaṃ janakatvam ity ādir ekaiko 'pi hetur namaskāryatā-prayojakaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:885: kiṃ ca sat ? vidhi-mukhena pratīyamānam astīit |
GE07bhg4c11u:887: athavā sad-vyaktam asad-vyaktaṃ tvam eva | tathā tat-paraṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:888: tābhyāṃ sad-asadbhyāṃ paraṃ mūla-kāraṇaṃ yad akṣaraṃ brahma tad api tvam eva tvad-bhinnaṃ kim api nāstīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:889: tat-paraṃ yad ity atra yac-chabdāt prāk-ca-kāram api kecit paṭhanti |
GE07bhg4c11u:890: etair hetubhis tvāṃ sarve namasyantīti na kim api citram ity arthaḥ ||37||
GE07bhg4c11u:891: viśvanāthaḥ : te kasmān na nameran, api tu namerann eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:893: sat-kāryam asat-kāraṇaṃ ca tābhyāṃ paraṃ yad akṣaraṃ brahma tat tvam ||37||
GE07bhg4c11u:895: atha bhagavataḥ sarva-namasyatvam abhidadhat sarva-vyāpitvāt sarvātmakatāṃ pratipādayati kasmāc ceti caturbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:896: he mahātman udāra-mate ! he ananta sarva-vyāpin ! he deveśa sarva-deva-niyantaḥ ! he jagannivāsa sarvāśraya ! te siddha-saṅghās te tubhyaṃ kasmād dhetor na nameran ?
GE07bhg4c11u:900: brahmaṇo 'py garīyase gurutarāya yasmād ādi-kartre tattva-sṛṣṭi-karāyeti namasyatve 'neke hetavaḥ santīti samuccayālaṅkāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:901: kiṃ ca yad akṣaraṃ prakṛti-tattvaṃ tat-paraṃ yad iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:902: tasmāt prakṛti-saṃsṛṣṭāj jīvātma-tattvāt prakṛti-tattvāc cokta-rūpāt param utkṛṣṭaṃ bhinnaṃ ca yan-mukta-jīvātma-tattvaṃ tac ca tvam eva sarva-rūpa ity arthaḥ ||37||
GE07bhg4c11u:907: vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma
GE07bhg4c11u:909: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca tvam ādi-deva iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:912: ataeva tvam asya paraṃ nidhānam laya-sthānam |
GE07bhg4c11u:914: yac ca vedyaṃ vastu-jātaṃ paraṃ ca dhāma vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ tad api tvam evāsi |
GE07bhg4c11u:915: ataeva he ananta-rūpa tvayaivedaṃ viśvaṃ tataṃ vyāptam |
GE07bhg4c11u:916: etaiś ca saptabhir hetubhis tvam eva namaskārya ity arthaḥ ||38||
GE07bhg4c11u:917: madhusūdanaḥ : bhakty-udrekāt punar api stauti tvam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:921: tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam laya-sthānatvān nidhīyate sarvam asminn iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:922: evaṃ sṛṣṭi-pralaya-sthānatvenopādānatvam uktvā sarvajñatvena pradhānaṃ vyāvartayan nimittatām āha vettā veditā sarvasyāsi |
GE07bhg4c11u:923: dvaitāpattiṃ vārayati yac ca vedyaṃ tad api tvam evāsi vedana-rūpe veditari paramārtha-sambandhābhāvena sarvasya vedyasya kalpitatvāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:924: ataeva paraṃ ca dhāma yat sac-cid-ānanda-ghanam avidyā-tat-kārya-nirmuktaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ tad api tvam evāsi |
GE07bhg4c11u:925: tvayā sad-rūpeṇa sphūraṇa-rūpeṇa ca kāraṇena tataṃ vyāptam idaṃ svataḥ-sattā-sphūrti-śūnyaṃ viśvam kāryaṃ māyika-sambandhenaiva sthiti-kāla he 'nantarūpāparicchinna-svarūpa ||38||
GE07bhg4c11u:926: viśvanāthaḥ : nidhānaṃ laya-sthānaṃ paraṃ dhāma guṇātītaṃ svarūpam ||38||
GE07bhg4c11u:928: paraṃ nidhānam paramāśrayo nidhīyate 'smin iti nirukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:929: jagati yo vettā yac ca vedyaṃ tad ubhayaṃ tvam eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:930: kuta evam iti cet tatrāha yat tvayā viśvam idaṃ tataṃ tad-vyāpitvād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:931: yac ca paraṃ dhāma parama-vyomākhyaṃ prāpya-sthānam tad api tvam eva parākhya-tvac-chakti-vaibhavatvāt tasya dhāmnaḥ ||38||
GE07bhg4c11u:937: punaś ca bhūyo 'pi namo namas te ||39||
GE07bhg4c11u:939: itaś ca sarvais tvam eva namaskāryaḥ sarva-devātmakatvād iti stuvan svayam api namaskaroti vāyur iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:945: bhūyo 'pi punar api sahasra-kṛtvo namo nama iti ||39||
GE07bhg4c11u:946: madhusūdanaḥ : vāyur yamo 'gnir varuṇaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ sūryādīnām apy upalakṣaṇam etat |
GE07bhg4c11u:948: prapitāmahaś pitāmahasya hiraṇya-garbhasyāpi pitā ca tvam |
GE07bhg4c11u:949: yasmād evaṃ sarva-devātmakatvāt tvam eva sarvair namaskāryo 'si tasmān mamāpi varākasya namo namo namas te tubhyam astu sahasrakṛtvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:950: punaś ca bhūyo 'pi punar api ca namo namas te |
GE07bhg4c11u:953: baladevaḥ : ataḥ sarva-śabda-vācyas tvam ity āha vāyur iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:954_0: sarva-devopalakṣaṇaṃ vāyv-ādi-sarva-deva-rūpas tvaṃ prajāpatiś caturāsyaḥ pitāmahas
GE07bhg4c11u:954_1: tvaṃ tat-pitṛtvāt prapitāmahas tvaṃ bhavasi kaṅkaṇādiṣu kanakasyeva cid-acic-chaktimatas
GE07bhg4c11u:954_2: tava kāraṇasya vāyv-ādiṣu vyāptes tat tat sarva-rūpas tvam ataḥ sarva-namasyo 'sīti
GE07bhg4c11u:954_3: mayā tvaṃ namasyase ity āha namo namaḥ ||39 ||
GE07bhg4c11u:962: bhakti-śraddhābhayātiśayena namaskāreṣu tṛptim anadhigacchan punar api bahuśaḥ praṇamati nama iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:963: he sarva sarvātman sarvāsu dikṣu tubhyaṃ namo 'stu |
GE07bhg4c11u:964: sarvātmakam upapādayann āha anantaṃ vīryaṃ sāmarthyaṃ yasya tathā |
GE07bhg4c11u:966: evaṃ bhūtas tvaṃ sarvaṃ viśvaṃ samyag antar bahiś ca samāpnoṣi vyāpnoṣi |
GE07bhg4c11u:967: suvarṇam iva kaṭaka-kuṇḍalādi sva-kāryaṃ vyāpya vartase tataḥ sarva-svarūpo 'si ||40||
GE07bhg4c11u:968: madhusūdanaḥ : tubhyaṃ purastād agra-bhāge namo 'stu tubhyaṃ puro namaḥ syād iti vā |
GE07bhg4c11u:971: namo 'stu te tubhyaṃ sarvata eva sarvāsu dikṣu sthitāya he sarva ! vīryaṃ śarīra-balaṃ vikramaḥ śikṣā śastra-prayoga-kauśalam |
GE07bhg4c11u:972: ekaṃ vīryādhikaṃ manya uttaikaṃ śikṣayādhikam ity ukter bhīma-duryodhanayor anyeṣu caikaikaṃ vyavasthitam |
GE07bhg4c11u:973: tvaṃ tu ananta-vīryaś cāmita-vikramaś ceti samastam ekaṃ padam |
GE07bhg4c11u:975: sarvaṃ samastaṃ jagat samāpnoṣi samyag ekenaa sad-rūpeṇāpnoṣi sarvātmanā vyāpnoṣi tatas tasmāt sarvo 'si tvad-atiriktaṃ kim api nāstīty arthaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c11u:977: sarvaṃ sva-kāryaṃ jagad āpnoṣi vyāpnoṣi svarṇam iva kaṭaka-kuṇḍalādikam atas tvam eva sarvaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c11u:979: bhakty-atiśayena namaskāreṣv alaṃ bhāvam avidan bahukṛtvaḥ praṇamati namaḥ purastād iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:980: he sarva ! purastāt pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvataś ca sthitāya te namo namo 'stu |
GE07bhg4c11u:982: vīryaṃ deha-balaṃ vikramas tu dhī-balaṃ śastra-prayogādi-prāvīṇya-rūpam |
GE07bhg4c11u:983: ekaṃ vīryādhikaṃ manyataikaṃ śikṣayādhikam iti bhīma-duryodhanāv uddiśyokteḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:987: sa tvam eva jagat-sraṣṭā yataḥ sarva-gato bhavān || iti ||40||
GE07bhg4c11u:991: he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti |
GE07bhg4c11u:998: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpayati sakhetīti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c11u:999: tvaṃ prākṛteḥ sakhety evaṃ matvā prasabhaṃ haṭhāt tiraskāreṇa yad uktaṃ tat kṣāmaye tvām ity uttareṇānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1000: kiṃ tat ? he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:1002: prasabhoktau hetuḥ - tava mahimānaṃ idaṃ ca viśva-rūpam ajānatā ca mayā pramādāt praṇayena snehena yad uktam iti ||41||
GE07bhg4c11u:1004: he acyuta ! yac ca parihāsārthaṃ krīḍādiṣu tiraskṛto 'si |
GE07bhg4c11u:1006: sakhīn vinā rahasi sthita ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1007: athavā tat-samakṣaṃ teṣāṃ parihasatāṃ sakhīnāṃ samakṣaṃ purato 'pi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1008: tat sarvam aparādha-jātaṃ tvām aprameyam acintya-prabhāvaṃ kṣāmaye kṣamāṃ kārayāmi ||42||
GE07bhg4c11u:1010: yato 'haṃ tvan-māhātmyāparijñānād aparādhān ajasrām akārṣaṃ tataḥ parama-kāruṇikaṃ tvāṃ praṇamyāparādha-kṣamāṃ kāryāmītyāha sakhetīti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c11u:1011: tvaṃ mama sakhā samāna-vayā iti matvā prasabhaṃ svotkarṣa-khyāpana-rūpeṇābhibhavena yad uktaṃ mayā tavedaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ tathā mahimānam aiśvaryātiśayam ajānatā |
GE07bhg4c11u:1013: pramādāc citta-vikṣepāt praṇayena snehena vāpi kim uktam ity āha he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti ||41||
GE07bhg4c11u:1014: yac cāvahāsārtham parihāsārthaṃ vihāra-śayyāsana-bhojaneṣu vihāraḥ krīḍā vyāyāmo vā,
GE07bhg4c11u:1017: bhojanaṃ bahūnāṃ paṅkāvaśanaṃ teṣu viṣaya-bhūteṣu asatkṛto 'si mayā paribhūto 'si ekaḥ sakhīn vihāya rahasi sthito vā tvam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1018: athavā tat-samakṣaṃ teṣāṃ sakhīnāṃ samakṣaṃ vā,
GE07bhg4c11u:1019_0: he 'cyuta ! sarvadā nirvikāra ! tat sarvaṃ vacana-rūpam asat-karaṇa-rūpaṃ cāparādha-jātaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1019_1: kṣāmaye kṣāmayāmi tvām aprameyam acintya-prabhāveṇa nirvikāreṇa ca parama-kāruṇikena
GE07bhg4c11u:1019_2: bhagavatā tvan-māhātmyānabhijñasya mamāparādhāḥ kṣantavyā ity arthaḥ ||42 ||
GE07bhg4c11u:1021: hanta hantaitādṛśa-mahā-mahaiśvaryamat tvayy ahaṃ kṛta-mahāparādha-puñjo 'smīty anutāpam āviṣkurvann āha sakhetīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1023: tvaṃ vasudeva-nāmno narasyārdharathatvenāpy aprasiddhasya putraḥ kṛṣṇa iti prasiddhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1025: yadu-vaṃśasya tava nāsti rājatvaṃ, mama tu puru-vaṃśasyāsty eva rājatvam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1028: tad api tvayā saha mama yat sakhyaṃ tatra tava paitrika-prabhāvo na hetuḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1030: kintu tāvaka evety abhiprāyato yeat prasabhaṃ sa-tiraskāram uktaṃ mayā tat kṣāmaye kṣamayāmīty uttareṇānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1031_0: tavedaṃ viśva-rūpātmakaṃ svarūpam eva mahimānaṃ pramādād vā praṇayena snehena vā
GE07bhg4c11u:1031_1: parihāsārthaṃ vihārādiṣv asatkṛto 'si tvaṃ satyavādī niṣkapaṭaḥ parama-sarala ity-ādi-vakroktyā
GE07bhg4c11u:1033: athavā tat samakṣaṃ teṣāṃ parihasatāṃ sakhīnāṃ samakṣaṃ purato 'si yadā sthitas tadā jātaṃ tat sarvam aparādha-sahasraṃ kṣāmaye |
GE07bhg4c11u:1036: evam arjunaḥ sahasra-śīrṣādi-lakṣaṇaṃ sva-sakhaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vilokya saṃstutya praṇamya ca sva-sakhyasyaiśvarya-jñāna-saṃmiśratvāt tad-anurūpam anunayati sakheti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c11u:1037_0: kṛṣṇo bhagavān me sakhā mitram iti matvā niścitya tavedaṃ sahasra-śīrṣatvādi-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1037_1: mahimānam ajānatānanubhavatā mayā pramādād anavadhānataḥ praṇayena sakhya-premṇā
GE07bhg4c11u:1037_2: vā yat tvāṃ prati prasabhaṃ haṭhād uktam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1039: kiṃ tad iti cet tatrāha he kṛṣṇety ādi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1041: etāni trīṇi sambodhanāny anādara-garbhāṇi he kṛṣṇety atra śrī-pūrvakatvābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1044: kiṃ ca, yac ca vihārādiṣv avahāsārthaṃ parihāsāyāsatkṛto
GE07bhg4c11u:1045: 'si satya-vāk saralo niṣkapaṭas tvam ity evaṃ vyañjaka-śabdair avajñāto 'si |
GE07bhg4c11u:1046: ekaḥ sakhīn vinā vijane sthitas tat samakṣaṃ vā teṣāṃ parihasatāṃ sakhīnāṃ purato vā sthita ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1047: tat sarva-vacana-rūpam asatkāra-rūpaṃ vāparādha-jātaṃ kṣāmaye kṣamasva prabho bhagavann ity anunayāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1048: he acyuteti saty apy aparādhe 'vicyuta-sakhety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1053: tvam asya pūjyaś ca gurur garīyān |
GE07bhg4c11u:1057: na vidyate pratimā upamā yasya so 'pratimaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1058: tathāvidhaḥ prabhāvo yasya tava he apratima-prabhāva |
GE07bhg4c11u:1059: tvam asya carācarasya lokasya pitā janako 'si |
GE07bhg4c11u:1060: ataeva pūjyaś ca guruś ca guror api garīyān gurutaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1061: ato loka-traye 'pi na tvat-sama eva tāvad-anyo nāsti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1065: asya carācarasya lokasya pitā janakas tvam asi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1069: ataeva na tvat-samo 'sty abhyadhikaḥ kuto 'nyo loka-traye 'pi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1070: he apratima-prabhāva ! yasya samo 'pi nāsti dvitīyasya parameśvarasyābhāvāt tasyādhiko 'nyaḥ kutaḥ syāt sarvathā na sambhāvyata evety arthaḥ ||43||
GE07bhg4c11u:1073: asya lokasya pitā pūjyo guruḥ śāstropadeṣṭā ca tvam asi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1074: ataḥ sarvaiḥ prakārair garīyān gurutaras tvam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1075: he 'pratima-prabhāva ! ato 'smin loka-traye nikhile 'pi jagati tvat-sama eva nāsti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1076: dvitīyasya pareśasyābhāvād eva tvad-adhiko 'nyaḥ kutaḥ syāt ?
GE07bhg4c11u:1077: śrutiś caivam āha na tat-samaś cābhyadhikaś ca dṛśyate iti ||43||
GE07bhg4c11u:1090: atas tvaṃ mahāparādhaṃ soḍhuṃ kṣantum arhati |
GE07bhg4c11u:1091: kasya kva iva ? putrasyāparādhaṃ kṛpayā pitā yathā sahate |
GE07bhg4c11u:1093: priyaś ca priyāyā aparādhaṃ tat-priyārthaṃ yathā sahate tadvat ||44||
GE07bhg4c11u:1095: tasmāt praṇamya namaskṛtya tvāṃ praṇidhāya prakarṣeṇa nīcair dhṛtvā kāyaṃ daṇḍavad bhūmau patitveti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c11u:1096: prasādaye tvām īśam īḍyam sarva-stutyam aham aparādhī |
GE07bhg4c11u:1097: ato he deva ! piteva putrasyāparādhaṃ sakheva sakhyur aparādhaṃ priyaḥ priyāyāḥ pativratāyā aparādhaṃ mamāparādhaṃ tvaṃ soḍhum kṣantum arhasi ananya-śaraṇatvān mama |
GE07bhg4c11u:1099: viśvanāthaḥ : kāyaṃ praṇidhāya bhūmau daṇḍavan nipātya priyāyārhasīti sandhir ārṣaḥ ||44||
GE07bhg4c11u:1101: kāyaṃ bhūmau praṇidhāya praṇamyeti sāṣṭāṅgaṃ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā |
GE07bhg4c11u:1104: sakheva sakhyur iti tu tadā mahaiśvaryaṃ vīkṣya svasmin dāsatva-mananāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1110: tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1112: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ kṣamāpayitvā prārthayate adṛṣṭa-pūrvam iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c11u:1113: he deva pūrvam adṛṣṭaṃ tava rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito hṛṣṭo 'smi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1114: tathā bhayena ca me manaḥ pravyathitaṃ pracalitam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1115: tasmān mama vyathā-nivṛntaye tad eva rūpaṃ darśaya |
GE07bhg4c11u:1116: he devaśa he jagannivāsa prasanno bhava ||45||
GE07bhg4c11u:1118: evam aparādha-kṣamāṃ prārthya punaḥ prāg-rūpa-darśanaṃ viśvarūpopasaṃhareṇa prārthayate adṛṣṭa-pūrvam iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c11u:1119: kadāpy adṛṣṭa-pūrvaṃ pūrvam adṛṣṭaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito hṛṣṭo 'smi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1120: tad-vikṛta-rūpa-darśanajena bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ vyākulīkṛtaṃ mano me |
GE07bhg4c11u:1121: atas tad eva prācīnam eva mama prāṇāpekṣayāpi priyaṃ rūpaṃ me darśaya he deva he deveśa he jagan-nivāsa prasīda prāg-rūpa-darśana-rūpaṃ prasādaṃ me kuru ||45||
GE07bhg4c11u:1123: yadyapy adṛṣṭa-pūrvam idaṃ te viśva-rūpātmakaṃ vapur dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito 'smi tad apy asya ghoratvād bhayena manaḥ pravyathitam abhūt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1124: tasmāt tad eva mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ mat-prāṇa-koṭy-adhika-priyaṃ mādhurya-pārāvāraṃ vasudeva-nandanākāraṃ me darśaya prasīdety alaṃ tavaitādṛśaiśvaryasya darśanāyeti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1125: deveśeti tvaṃ sarvedvānām īśvaraḥ sarva-jagan-nivāso bhavasy eveti mayā pratītam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1126: atra viśva-rūpa-darśana-kāle sarva-svarūpa-mūla-bhūtaṃ narākāraṃ kṛṣṇa-vapus tatraiva sthitam api yogamāyācchāditatvād arjunena na dṛṣṭam iti gamyate ||45||

GE07bhg4c11u:1338: na veda-yajñādhyayanair ity ādinā gatārthaḥ ślokaḥ parama-durlabhatva-khyāpanāyābhyastaḥ ||53||
GE07bhg4c11u:1339: viśvanāthaḥ : kiṃ ca yuṣmad-aspṛhaṇīyam apy etat svarūpam anye puruṣārtha-sāratvena ye spṛhayanti,
GE07bhg4c11u:1340: tair vedādhyayanādibhir api sādhanair etaj jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ cāśakyam eveti pratīhīty āha nāham iti ||53||
GE07bhg4c11u:1342: evaṃvidho devakī-sūnuś caturbhujas tvat-sakho 'haṃ vedādibhir api sādhanaiḥ kenāpi puṃsā bhakti-śūnyena draṣṭuṃ na śakyo yathā tvaṃ māṃ dṛṣṭavān asi ||53||
GE07bhg4c11u:1345: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃ-vidho 'rjuna |
GE07bhg4c11u:1346: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca paraṃtapa ||54||
GE07bhg4c11u:1347: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi kenopāyena tvaṃ draṣṭuṃ śakya iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1349: ananyayā mad-eka-niṣṭhayā bhaktyā tv evambhūto viśvarūpo 'haṃ tattvena paramārthato jñātuṃ śakyaḥ śāstrataḥ draṣṭuṃ pratyakṣataḥ praveṣṭuṃ ca tādātmyena śakyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1352: yadi veda-tapo-dānejyābhir draṣṭum aśakyas tvaṃ tarhi kenopāyena draṣṭuṃ śakyo 'sīty ata āha bhaktyeti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1354_1: jñātuṃ śakyo 'nanyayā bhaktyā kintu tattvena draṣṭuṃ ca svarūpeṇa sākṣātkartuṃ ca
GE07bhg4c11u:1355: tataś ca svarūpa-sākṣātkārād avidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttau tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca mad-rūpatayaivāsuṃ cāhaṃ śakyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1357: viśvanāthaḥ : tarhi kena sādhanenaivaṃ prāpyata ity ata āha bhaktyā tv iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1361: tadā tattvena brahma-svarūpatvena praveṣṭum apy ananyayā bhaktyaiva śakyo nānyathā |
GE07bhg4c11u:1362_0: jñānināṃ guṇībhūtāpi bhaktir antima-samaye jñāna-saṃnyāsānāntaram urvaritāllīyasy
GE07bhg4c11u:1362_1: ananyaiva bhavet tayaiva teṣāṃ sāyujyaṃ bhaved iti tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate
GE07bhg4c11u:1363: baladevaḥ : abhimatāṃ para-bhaktaika-dṛśyatāṃ sphuṭayann āha bhaktyeti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1364: evaṃvidho devakī-sūnuś caturbhujo 'ham ananyayā mad-ekāntayā bhaktyā tu vedādibhis tattvato jñātuṃ śakyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1365: draṣṭuṃ pratyakṣaṃ kartuṃ tattvataḥ praveṣṭuṃ saṃyoktuṃ ca śakyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1366: puraṃ praviśatīty atra pura-saṃyoga eva pratīyate |
GE07bhg4c11u:1371: śrutiś caivam āha yasya deve parā bhaktiḥ ity ādyā |
GE07bhg4c11u:1373: na ca sudurdarśam ity ādi-trayaṃ sahasra-śīrṣa-rūpa-param iti vācyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1376: tatra yasya tad-eka-vākyatāyāṃ nāhaṃ vedaiḥ ity ādeḥ paunarukty-āpatteś ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:1377: yat tu divya-dṛṣṭi-dānena liṅgena narākārāc caturbhujāt sahasra-śīrṣṇo devākārasyotkarṣam āha tad-avicāritābhidhānam eva devākārasya tasya caturbhuja-narākārādhīnatvāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1378: tattvaṃ ca tasya yuktam eva yaḥ kāraṇārṇava-jale bhajati sma yoga-nidrām iti smaraṇāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1379: idaṃ narākṛti-kṛṣṇa-rūpaṃ saccidānandaṃ sarva-vedānta-vedyaṃ vibhuṃ sarvāvatārīti pratyetavyaṃ -
GE07bhg4c11u:1384: eko 'pi san bahudhā yo 'vabhāti [GTU 1.19] ity ādi śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1388: ete cāṃśa-kalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayaṃ ity ādi smaraṇāc ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:1389: atrāpi svayam evoktaṃ mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat iti, aham ādir hi devānāṃ ity ādi ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:1390: arjunena ca - paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1391: tasmād atiprabhāveṇa saṃkrānte sahasra-śīrṣṇi rūpe tena saṃkrāntaiva dṛṣṭir grāhiṇī yuktā,
GE07bhg4c11u:1392_1: bhāvena kṛṣṇa-rūpe sahasra-śīrṣatvavad arjuna-cakṣuṣi tādṛg-rūpa-grāhi tejastvam
GE07bhg4c11u:1393: na tu yuktyābhāsa-lābhena haitukatvaṃ svīkāryam, na cārjuno 'py anya-manuṣyavac carma-cakṣuṣkaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1395: karmodbhūtayā vidyayā sa-niṣṭhaiḥ sahasra-śiraskaṃ rūpaṃ labhyam iti durdarśaṃ tat narākṛti-kṛṣṇa-rūpaṃ tv ananyayā bhaktyaiveti sudurdarśaṃ tad uktam ||54||
GE07bhg4c11u:1399: nirvairaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava ||55||
GE07bhg4c11u:1400: śrīdharaḥ : ataḥ sarva-śāstra-sāraṃ paramaṃ rahasyaṃ śṛṇv ity āha mat-karma-kṛd iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1402: aham eva paramaḥ puruṣārtho yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1406: evaṃ bhūto yaḥ sa māṃ prāpnoti | nānya iti ||55||
GE07bhg4c11u:1413: adhunā sarvasya gītā-śāstrasya sāra-bhūto 'rtho niḥśreyasārthinām anuṣṭhānāya puñjīkṛtyocyate mad iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1415: svargādi-kāmanāyāṃ satyāṃ katham evam iti nety āha mat-paramaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1416: aham eva paramaḥ prāptavyatvena niścito na tu svargādir yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1417: ataeva mat-prāpty-āśayā mad-bhaktaḥ sarvaiḥ prakārair mama bhajana-paraḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1418: putrādiṣu snehe sati katham evaṃ syād iti nety āha saṅga-varjitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1420: śatruṣu dveṣe sati katham evaṃ syād iti nety āha nivairaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu |
GE07bhg4c11u:1421: apakāriṣv api dveṣa-śūnyo yaḥ sa mām ety abhedena |
GE07bhg4c11u:1422: he pāṇḍava ! ayam arthas tvayā jñātum iṣṭo mayopadiṣṭo nātaḥ paraṃ kiṃcit kartavyam astīty arthaḥ ||55||
GE07bhg4c11u:1426: atha bhakti-prakaraṇopasaṃhārārthaṃ saptamādhyāyādiṣu ye ye bhaktā uktās teṣāṃ sāmānya-lakṣaṇam āha mat-karma-kṛd iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1432: baladevaḥ : atha sva-prāpti-karīm ananyāṃ bhaktim upadiśann upasaṃharati mad iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1434: mat-paramo mām eva na tu svargādikaṃ sva-pumarthaṃ jānan |
GE07bhg4c11u:1438: teṣv api mad-vimukheṣu pratikūleṣu satsu vaira-śūnyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1440: evambhūto yo māṃ narākāraṃ kṛṣṇam eti labhate, nānyaḥ ||55||
